contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xuray |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Qusar Rayon|Qusar]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total =676 |population_footnotes ={{citation needed|date=October 2010}} |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=41 |latm=22 |lats=03 |latNS=N |longd=48|longm=18 |longs=24 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xuray''' (also, '''Khuray''') is a village and municipality in the [[Qusar Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. It has a population of 676. == References == {{Reflist}} *{{GEOnet2|32FA881509D73774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Qusar Rayon}} [[Category:Populated places in Qusar District]] {{Qusar-geo-stub}}
